name: Letterdrop
headline: Automated social selling to book more meetings
description: Target leads interested in you, competitors, and problems you solve. Attract more of them through automated nurture and thought leadership.

Ask me about GTM, B2B Marketing, and being a solo founder
Former Google Search and Workspace PM

Social Selling for GTM teams
# **Find warm leads you're missing today**
3.8x booking rate vs cold outreach. Target leads interested in you, competitors, and problems you solve. Attract more of them through automated thought leadership from your sales calls.
[Book Demo](https://letterdrop.com/</demo>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64aaded25575bed150838f01/66d8ce12e5698583cfe2e0fb_Screenshot%202024-09-04%20at%205.15.00%E2%80%AFPM.png)![Parthi, Letterdrop -CEO, video thumbnail headshot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64aaded25575bed150838f01/64c1f01524d9920b4649a5aa_Parthi_Loganathan_Letterdrop.jpg)Watch an overview3 min](https://letterdrop.com/<#>)
Sales, Demand Gen, and RevOps teams close $1.4M+ in pipeline gaps on average with Letterdrop

Easy to adopt
Power nurture and outbound across your team — just takes one person to run
Proven playbooks
We help you replicate best practices from top sellers
Results in 30 days
Spend 10 mins per day in Letterdrop and see your first leads within a month. Compounds over time.
Impressed with how we rolled out social selling across the team in 60 days. Seeing real impact on both pipeline as well as individual rep and brand perception
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64acbbba332ae9274b5ec994/67937c5546f104d14b14d915_neal_goyal.jpg)
Neal Goyal
VP Strategic Sales
,
Disco
[View](https://letterdrop.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=N3cbI7AaJWI>)
Before Letterdrop, we struggled to get Sales posting 2-3 times/week. Now, they are doing it daily and loving it. Bought in on Day 1.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64acbbba332ae9274b5ec994/677c4e4fa22068717e507884_branca-ballot.jpg)
Branca Ballot
VP Marketing
,
Glide

Booked 4 deals in 3 weeks. That's $200k in pipeline. Closed 3 of them. Working very well for us.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64acbbba332ae9274b5ec994/677c466cc9799c6dc805ca49_will_schiffelbein.jpeg)
Will Schiffelbein
Director of Demand Gen and ABM
,
Virtuous
[View](https://letterdrop.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/shorts/e3FHJrpQBdU>)
### The problem: Everyday, you chase cold leads instead of talking to warm leads primed to speak to you
#### Old school prospecting
without Letterdrop
Buy a list of accounts
Drop everyone in a sequence for cold email and cold calling
1% success rate
Most people are not in market. And it's hard to connect with them. So you will get results, but it will be a challenge.
Sellers stuck chasing unrealistic activity
Missed targets? Let's do more calls, send more email, send more DMs. End up in spam and burn out.
**Miss targets and actual buyers who want to talk to you**
Spray and pray spread resources thin. You miss the buyers who are actually in market. You should have been building relationships with them and reaching out at the right time.
#### Efficient demand gen
with Letterdrop
**Setup your target accounts and topics**
Upload every sales rep's target named accounts, your competitors and topics of interest
**Warm leads surfaced to you**
Relevant leads who are aware of you or interested in relevant topics are found
**Start conversations**
Engage with warm leads thoughtfully. They respond at 3.8x the rate of cold leads.
**Attract more buyers to you**
Post thought leadership for your execs and sellers sourced from sales calls to attract more buyers, build awareness, and collect more intent data.
Success that compounds
Boom! You just blew through your targets. Letterdrop adds low hanging fruit opps into your existing prospecting for just 10 mins of additional work everyday.
### Book more meetings with the same headcount
More hiring, more activity, more volume to get more leads doesn't work like it used to. Cold outbound is harder than ever. Instead, build trust with buyers, educate them, and reach out to buyers showing intent.
Buyers overwhelmed
The average decision maker gets 80 cold outbounds per day across email, LinkedIn, and cold calls. Impossible to reach them.
No one wants to connect with sellers
Buyers don’t want to connect and get pitch slapped. Strangers are sent straight to junk
More volume isn't the answer
You can't just increase activity to book more meetings. You'll see your emails marked spam and numbers blacklisted.
Easy setup
## 45 min setup to start seeing outputs on your first day
Our Customer Success team will help you:‍• Have sellers connect their accounts• Define your buyer persona• Upload your target accounts and keywords• Connect your CRM and SEP: HubSpot, Salesforce, Apollo, Outreach, Clay• Connect your call recorder: Gong, Chorus, Fireflies, Zoom, etcSOC-2 Type II certified for easy Security and IT approval.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64aaded25575bed150838f01/677c6bdb1f055b947740ac7e_gong.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64aaded25575bed150838f01/677c6ea025adb6f269a27a24_clari.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64aaded25575bed150838f01/677c6eb7f423e08e32462ae1_chorus.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64aaded25575bed150838f01/677c6ec1d2177c67846565a4_fireflies.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64aaded25575bed150838f01/677c6ece737a4b26b56227ab_grain.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64aaded25575bed150838f01/677c6ee1d2177c6784657f0e_zoom.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64aaded25575bed150838f01/677c6eee8c35cfc04e2536a6_meet.svg)
[Book Demo](https://letterdrop.com/</demo>)
Capture demand
## Find warm leads familiar with you and problems you solve
Find ICP buyers who are familiar with you or problems you solve in real time. These low hanging fruit leads **book demos at a 3.8x higher rate** than cold leads. Prioritize them first in your outbound.
[Book Demo](https://letterdrop.com/</demo>)
Warm leads discovered and acted on
## Identify low hanging fruit leads and nurture target accounts — automatically
Warm leads interested in you, competition, or relevant topics show up in your CRM or Slack every day. Automatically nurture target accounts on behalf of your sellers. Push leads into Salesforce, HubSpot, Apollo, Outreach, Clay, Zapier, and Webhooks.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64aaded25575bed150838f01/677c73328de93a84f313f459_salesforce.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64aaded25575bed150838f01/677c733c78bf1edc666947dc_hubspot.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64aaded25575bed150838f01/677c7349444787716ac23826_apollo.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64aaded25575bed150838f01/677c7358d6983ea3164c30b8_outreach.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64aaded25575bed150838f01/677c73608de6309f9d802dc7_clay.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64aaded25575bed150838f01/677c7414d2177c678469ea26_zapier.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64aaded25575bed150838f01/677c742123235baab68d0e69_webhook.svg)
[Book Demo](https://letterdrop.com/</demo>)
Attract even more buyers
## 5 mins to have execs and reps posting every week
Make every rep a lead magnet and create a "surround sound" effect around your buyers. Turn conversations from sales calls into thought leadership content to stay top of mind."Saw your post and it's like you read my mind. Just scheduled some time."— every prospect your team is connected with
[Book Demo](https://letterdrop.com/</demo>)
The below posts were over 90% written by Letterdrop with some light editing. Created from sales calls with customers.
[See posts you could generate](https://letterdrop.com/</samples>)

## How much pipeline are you leaving on the table?
Talk to us to get a missed pipeline estimation for your company. Most of our customers see at least $200k in new ARR from activate their reps.
[Book Demo](https://letterdrop.com/</demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64aaded25575bed150838f01/64e279061805eeff7a4b25eb_Card.svg)
## Still hesitant? We've got answers
Who should use Letterdrop?
Letterdrop is a great fit if you're sales-led, need pipeline, and want to start an inbound-led outbound motion.
Which industries are a best fit for this playbook?
We've seen the most success for companies in two categories:1. You sell to buyers in Sales, Marketing, or HR.2. You sell to a skeptical or technical buyer where cold outbound is hard. You need to educate decision makers. Think Cybersecurity, IT decision makers, CTOs.We've seen Letterdrop work for all kinds of buyers in other industries like BIM managers in construction or CFOs. You'd be surprised.
Why should my reps start social selling?
Most teams are seeing diminishing returns on increased cold activity. A small percentage of your market is ready to buy at any time. You should focus your outreach on hand raisers showing interest and instead nurture everyone else. We help you go after low hanging fruit instead of spamming your TAM.Here's a clip from the former CRO of Tropic on why social selling is such a great investment for sellers.
I'm worried my reps won't adopt it
For prospecting, reps don't need to do anything. All they have to do is connect their accounts and Letterdrop can be centrally managed by a single person on your RevOps or Marketing team. It's all taken care of for the reps.For posting, you can get a marketer to quickly write content (5 mins w/ Letterdrop) on the rep's behalf. We recommend this to start (but it doesn't scale). Thankfully, once reps start seeing the impact, they are excited to start posting themselves.‍Here's a clip from Sales and Marketing leaders and BDRs who are building real pipeline with social selling. You can also see numbers from our [own study here.](https://letterdrop.com/<https:/letterdrop.com/blog/impact-of-social-selling>)
### Get real results fast
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64aaded25575bed150838f01/677b08fac3fd79abb252fcb3_virtuous.svg)
Closed 3 deals they'd otherwise miss
4 opps in 3 weeks
Missed leads found
Closed 3 out of 4 qualified opportunities found in 3 weeks with Letterdrop
+$200k pipeline
Pipeline gaps closed
Low effort way to build more pipeline

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Letterdrop**

Founded in 2020 and based in San Francisco, Letterdrop is a member of Y Combinator's W20 batch and has assembled a focused team of 10 passionate individuals. At its core, Letterdrop's mission is simple yet powerful: to automate social selling to help businesses book more meetings. The company offers a fresh approach to lead generation, emphasizing the importance of engaging with warm leads instead of drowning in cold outreach, which often yields a puny 1% success rate.

### What They Do

Initially focused on targeting leads interested in the problems they solve and competitive dynamics, Letterdrop has evolved into a sophisticated platform. They help sales and marketing teams find warm leads—those already acquainted with your brand or the relevant issues—enabling a more efficient outreach strategy and, as a result, a significantly improved booking rate of 3.8 times compared to traditional methods. 

Letterdrop integrates thought leadership into the sales process. By automating the nurturing of leads through rich content generated from sales calls, it ensures that your team consistently attracts and retains the attention of potential buyers.

### Why Letterdrop?

Letterdrop makes it easy for sales and marketing professionals to maximize their outreach potential, with the following key benefits:

- **Effortless Set-Up:** With just a 45-minute onboarding process, users can start seeing meaningful outputs almost immediately.
- **Automated Lead Identification:** It diligently surfaces relevant leads who are familiar with your offerings or the competition, pushing these insights directly into your CRM or Slack.
- **Nurtured Relationships:** Instead of bombarding prospects with cold emails, Letterdrop allows for thoughtful engagement with leads, tailoring conversations to those already expressing interest.

### Results and Impact

Users of Letterdrop have reported closing significant pipeline gaps, averaging around **$1.4 million** in new opportunities. The platform has proven especially beneficial for sales, demand generation, and revenue operations teams, demonstrating real results within just 30 days of utilization. 

For example, one marketing VP noted their sales team progressed from sporadic social media interactions to daily engagement, directly attributed to their use of Letterdrop. Another user transformed a few warm leads into $200,000 in closed deals in under a month.

### Target Audience

Here’s who thrives on Letterdrop:
- VP Marketing: Build inbound engines tied to revenue.
- Content Marketers: Create impactful, resonating content for buyers.
- VP Sales: Establish trust and credibility to enhance meeting bookings.

### Why It Matters

In today's crowded digital landscape, traditional outbound strategies often place sellers on the back foot, competing against an avalanche of spammy outreach. Instead, Letterdrop encourages businesses to pivot toward building genuine relationships with potential buyers, moving towards an inbound-led sales strategy that feels more authentic and less forced. 

If you're grappling with the challenges of cold outreach or seeking to optimize your sales efforts, check out [Letterdrop](https://letterdrop.com) for an innovative solution centered around social selling.
